statements: SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT mediator_id, conflict_description FROM ConflictResolution WHERE conflict_type = 'Legal';
SELECT arbitrator_id, conflict_type FROM ConflictResolution WHERE mediator_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY arbitrator_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution WHERE mediator_id = 1
SELECT conflict_type, conflict_description FROM ConflictResolution WHERE arbitrator_id = 3
SELECT mediator_id, arbitrator_id, conflict_type FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY arbitrator_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution WHERE conflict_description LIKE '%important%' AND conflict_type = 'legal' ORDER BY mediator_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conflicts FROM ConflictResolution
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT mediator_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE conflict_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT arbitrator_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY arbitrator_id DESC;
SELECT flag_id, flag_reason, flagged_by_user FROM conflict_flags WHERE flag_id < 100 ORDER BY flag_id ASC;
SELECT mediator_id, arbitrator_id FROM conflict_flags WHERE flag_reason LIKE '%conflict%' ORDER BY mediator_id, arbitrator_id;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE mediator_id = 1 AND conflict_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT mediator_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE conflict_description LIKE '%corruption%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_conflicts FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT DISTINCT mediator_id FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY mediator_id DESC;
SELECT arbitrator_id, COUNT(*) AS flag_count FROM conflict_flags GROUP BY arbitrator_id HAVING flag_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_mediators;
SELECT id, name, specialization FROM conflict_resolution_arbitrators WHERE conflicts_flagged = TRUE;
SELECT case_name, mediator_id, arbitrator_id FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_opened = FALSE;
SELECT name, organization FROM conflict_resolution_arbitrators WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, CASE WHEN conflicts_flagged THEN 'Flagged' ELSE 'Not Flagged' END AS conflict_status FROM conflict_resolution_mediators;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_mediators WHERE conflicts_flagged = TRUE;
SELECT name, specialization FROM conflict_resolution_mediators WHERE specialization = 'Mediation';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_arbitrators ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT case_name, mediator_id, arbitrator_id FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_opened = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_mediators JOIN conflict_resolution_cases ON conflict_resolution_mediators.id = conflict_resolution_cases.mediator_id;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_mediators;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_email FROM conflict_resolution_mediators WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, conflict_resolution_type FROM conflict_resolution_mediators ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_arbitrators WHERE conflict_resolution_type = 'Arbitration';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_mediators;
SELECT mediator_name, conflict_resolution_type FROM conflict_resolution_mediators WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_description LIKE '%conflict%';
SELECT arbitrator_name, arbitrator_email FROM conflict_resolution_arbitrators ORDER BY arbitrator_name DESC;
SELECT flag_type, flagged_by, flag_date FROM conflict_resolution_flags WHERE flag_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Conflict_Resolutions ORDER BY conflict_date DESC;
SELECT conflict_description, conflict_date FROM Conflict_Resolutions WHERE mediator_id = 3;
SELECT mediator_name, expertise_area FROM Mediators WHERE mediator_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT arbitrator_name, cases_handled FROM Arbitrators WHERE specialization = 'Labor Disputes';
SELECT report_content FROM Conflict_Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Conflict_Resolutions WHERE mediator_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, experience_years FROM Mediators ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT arbitrator_name, specialization FROM Arbitrators WHERE cases_handled > 10;
SELECT conflict_id, conflict_description FROM Conflict_Resolutions WHERE conflict_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_content FROM Conflict_Reports JOIN Conflict_Resolutions ON Conflict_Reports.conflict_id = Conflict_Resolutions.conflict_id;
